name: Bronxville
overview: Bronxville is Westchester County's most prestigious village â€” a tightly-held community of grand Tudor and Colonial estates set on tree-canopied streets just 16 miles from Midtown Manhattan. With one of the top-rated school districts in the state, a quaint village center, and an extraordinarily loyal resident base, Bronxville consistently commands Westchester's highest prices.
